We can not find the page you're looking for. Welcome to ASP.NET Zero startup project!
In this demo, you can use the left menu to test the application. This dashboard page is just for demonstration, but all other pages and functionalities are fully implemented, working and ready for production. You can add/apply your business requirements on this startup project (or remove any functionality you don't need). Thus, you can have a signification time gain to immediately start your own project requirements.
Welcome! Welcome to the application. You can use the menu to start using the application. If you don't see any menu item, probably you don't have permission to see any page. Consider asking a system administrator for permissions. Requested file does not exist! Mail sent A password reset link sent to your e-mail address. Please check your emails. Download all Tenant management Allow tenants to register to the system. If you disable this, tenants will only be added by admin using tenant management page. New registered tenants are active by default. If you disable this, new tenants will not be active (and can not login) until admin manually activates the account.
